      • getTemplate

        @POST
@Path(value="{datasetid}")
@JSONP(queryParam="callback")
@Produces(value="application/json")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTemplate(@QueryParam(value="callback")
                                                                      java.lang.String callback,
                                                                      @PathParam(value="datasetid")
                                                                      java.lang.String ds,
                                                                      java.lang.String jsonData)
        Method handling POST request to retrieve data for client to create resource
        Parameters:
        callback - - for jsonp handling
        ds - - datasetid where the resource data from the client will go to
        jsonData - - additional information "resourceType" is class associated with the requested RDFform template
        Returns:
        JSON representation containing datasetpath,datasetid,initialized rdf/json graph and resourceid
